item.title: One More Day
item.description:
One More Day by Elder Taylor G. Godoy, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 188th Annual General Conference on Sat Mar 31 2018
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Taylor G. Godoy, Of the Seventy

item.title: Call, Don’t Fall
item.description:
Call, Don’t Fall by Elder Taylor G. Godoy, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 194th Annual General Conference on Sun Mar 31 2024
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
